verses.text: O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou \add art\add* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; I will \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* thee, I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; for thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w wonderful|strong="H6382"\w* \add things; thy\add* \w counsels|strong="H6098"\w* of \w old|strong="H7350"\w* \add are\add* \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w* \add and\add* \w truth|strong="H0544"\w*.

For thou hast \w made|strong="H7760"\w* of a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* an \w heap|strong="H1530"\w*; \add of\add* a \w defenced|strong="H1219"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w* a \w ruin|strong="H4654"\w*: a \w palace|strong="H0759"\w* of \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* to be no \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; it shall \w never|strong="H5769"\w* be \w built|strong="H1129"\w*.

Therefore shall the \w strong|strong="H5794"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w glorify|strong="H3513"\w* thee, the \w city|strong="H7151"\w* of the \w terrible|strong="H6184"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thee.

For thou hast been a \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* to the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, a \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* to the \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* in his \w distress|strong="H6862"\w*, a \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w* from the \w storm|strong="H2230"\w*, a \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* from the \w heat|strong="H2721"\w*, when the \w blast|strong="H7307"\w* of the terrible \w ones|strong="H6184"\w* \add is\add* as a \w storm|strong="H2230"\w* \add against\add* the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*.

Thou shalt bring \w down|strong="H3665"\w* the \w noise|strong="H7588"\w* of \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w*, as the \w heat|strong="H2721"\w* in a dry \w place|strong="H6724"\w*; \add even\add* the \w heat|strong="H2721"\w* with the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of a \w cloud|strong="H5645"\w*: the \w branch|strong="H2159"\w* of the terrible \w ones|strong="H6184"\w* shall be brought \w low|strong="H6030"\w*.

¶ And in this \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* shall the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* unto all \w people|strong="H5971"\w* a \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* of fat \w things|strong="H8081"\w*, a \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* of wines on the \w lees|strong="H8105"\w*, of fat \w things|strong="H8081"\w* full of \w marrow|strong="H4229"\w*, of wines on the \w lees|strong="H8105"\w* well \w refined|strong="H2212"\w*.

And he will \w destroy|strong="H1104"\w* in this \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w covering|strong="H3875"\w* cast \w over|strong="H3874"\w* all \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and the \w vail|strong="H4541"\w* that is \w spread|strong="H5259"\w* over all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.\f + \fr 25.7 \ft destroy: Heb. swallow up\f*\f + \fr 25.7 \ft cast: Heb. covered\f*

He will swallow \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* in \w victory|strong="H5331"\w*; and the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* will wipe \w away|strong="H4229"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w* from off all \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*; and the \w rebuke|strong="H2781"\w* of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall he take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from off all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.

¶ And it shall be \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, Lo, this \add is\add* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; we have \w waited|strong="H6960"\w* for him, and he will \w save|strong="H3467"\w* us: this \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; we have \w waited|strong="H6960"\w* for him, we will be \w glad|strong="H1523"\w* and \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in his \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.

For in this \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* shall the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*, and \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* shall be trodden \w down|strong="H1758"\w* under him, even as \w straw|strong="H4963"\w* is trodden \w down|strong="H1758"\w* for the \w dunghill|strong="H1119"\w*.\f + \fr 25.10 \ft trodden down under: or, threshed, etc\f*\f + \fr 25.10 \ft trodden down for…: or, threshed in Madmenah\f*

And he shall spread \w forth|strong="H6566"\w* his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of them, as he that \w swimmeth|strong="H7811"\w* spreadeth \w forth|strong="H6566"\w* \add his hands\add* to \w swim|strong="H7811"\w*: and he shall bring \w down|strong="H8213"\w* their \w pride|strong="H1346"\w* together with the \w spoils|strong="H0698"\w* of their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

And the \w fortress|strong="H4013"\w* of the high \w fort|strong="H4869"\w* of thy \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* shall he bring \w down|strong="H7817"\w*, lay \w low|strong="H8213"\w*, \add and\add* \w bring|strong="H5060"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, \add even\add* to the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.
